distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for gnutls fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2021-4209: Fixed null pointer dereference in MD_UPDATE (bsc#1196167).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: A NULL pointer dereference flaw was found in GnuTLS. As Nettle's hash update functions internally call memcpy, providing zero-length input may cause undefined behavior. This flaw leads to a denial of service after authentication in rare circumstances.
notes.title: CVE description
